name: Grand River Tuskers Sports Club
body:
![LOGO](https://github.com/grtuskersclub/GRT-Membership-2020/blob/master/Image/GRT.jpg) # ******Click Here: To Register For 2020 Membership******

Fees:

For New Members : $80/-

For Student Membership: $50/-

Schedule:

Weekdays Evenings
Weekends Mornings

Concerned of COVID-19?

We are proud to say that our club have come-up with an Awareness & Educational Video on Safe Resumption of Cricket During COVID-19, which our club adhere to for the safety of all players & cricketing community to reduce the risk based of the guidance from City's & Cricket governing bodies

Let's play responsibly!

Click Here: A Cricket & COVID-19 Educational & Awareness

### About Us: We are a Not-For-Profit Organisation. Our aim is to promote sports, games and recreation in our community and to attract more sports enthusiasts of all age groups and abilities to foster community togetherness with sportsmanship. Our initial focus is to promote the game of Cricket and gradually extend. # ### History: The team was found in 2018 when a group of passionate Cricket lovers who played together, decided to put together a team of their own. Its members are basically from Guelph, Cambridge, Waterloo , Kitchener and Fergus Ontario. We chose name of the river, "Grand River" that runs across these areas. Why the name Tuskers? Our team was formed by members hailing from Kerala, a small and beautiful state in south India famous for its elephants, to symbolize the power of elephants we chose "Tuskers”. "Grand River Tuskers Sports Club“ was incorporated as a Not-for-Profit organization in 2019. ### Motto: To promote sports, games and recreation in our community and to attract more sports enthusiasts of all age groups and abilities to foster community togetherness with sportsmanship. Our initial focus is to promote the game of Cricket and gradually extend it to other team sports like Soccer, Badminton, Tennis, Volley ball, Swimming, Ultimate Frisbee, fishing and grow organically into full fledged Sports Club with the focus to have a quality fun time to all its members. ### To know more visit our fb page: https://www.facebook.com/grtuskersclub ### For 2020 Membership Click Here: 2020 Membership Registration
